descript.abstract: This dataset is one part of a multi-layer dataset representing data collected by the Maine-New Hampshire Inshore Trawl Survey. For more information on the Maine-New Hampshire Inshore Trawl Survey, please see:Â https://www.maine.gov/dmr/science-research/projects/trawlsurvey/index.htmlThe layers included are:Tows (polyline)Catch (table)Strata (polygon)Regions (lines)Grid (polygon)"Grid" contains the grid cells utilized by the survey.Description of fields:grid_id - Unique grid cell ID.depth_stratum - Depth stratum the grid cell occurs within. See the strata layer for more information.region_id - Region the grid cell occurs within. See the region layer for more information.surveys - Hypen-delimited string of all the surveys that have occurred within the grid cell, sorted by survey date ascending. This is based on any part of a survey tow occurring within the grid cell.last_survey - The last survey that occurred within the grid cell.area_nm - The area of the grid cell in square nautical miles.
descript.purpose: Grid used by the Maine-New Hampshire Inshore Trawl Survey.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.
